name: Education is easy
title: Top Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2017, Canada achieved a 100% net enrollment rate for female students in secondary education, showcasing its commitment to gender equality in education.

name: Healthcare Heroes
title: Leading Universal Health Coverage
description: As of 2021, Canada boasts a UHC service coverage index of 91, reflecting its robust healthcare system that ensures comprehensive services for its citizens.

name: Investment Exodus
title: Significant Portfolio Equity Outflows
description: In 2023, Canada experienced a net outflow of portfolio equity amounting to $35.8 billion, indicating a challenging investment climate.
